name: Remarkable Retail Podcast
what_you_do: The Food Professor Podcast explores various topics related to food, nutrition, and the food industry, providing insights and discussions with experts in the field.
who_you_serve: The podcast serves food enthusiasts, industry professionals, and anyone interested in learning more about food and nutrition.
